name: Increbidel Indistries
description:
A little puzzle game with frenetic drag and drop action, don't let Incredibel Indistries down, you must be fast and avoid losing products down the assembly line. We build the products of tomorrow, today!

On the web version, mouse pointers may be buggy (Godot limitation), some animations may be glitchy, if you experience some problems, try the executable versions.
